messagebundle.msg: Custom Orkut Toolbar Generator

This application will allow you to create your own Custom Orkut Toolbar in a single click. You can add your favorite links in your orkut linkbar and make orkutting more productive and enjoyable than ever.
is Creating His Personalized Orkut Toolbar!
